name: One Tower GX 204 Project
description:
I was tasked with creating a tower defence game while keeping my personal ability and confidence level in mind. Adjusting the scope of the design includes changing the number of unit types, simplifying the art style and animation, and more. Towers should have primary upgrading routes, and soldiers should appear in huge numbers on the screen during gaming. This will allow me to understand how optimizations are being applied to the project easily. I needed to evaluate comments in order to provide the gamer with all essential information.

My project was inspired by The Perfected tower.

(Second Year project 2022)
